verses.text: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, the \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* that ye \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0516"\w* of the \w vocation|strong="G2821"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* ye are \w called|strong="G2564"\w*,

\w With|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w lowliness|strong="G5012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w*, \w forbearing|strong="G0430"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*;

\w Endeavouring|strong="G4704"\w* to \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w unity|strong="G1775"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w bond|strong="G4886"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\add There is\add* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye are \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*;
\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w*,

\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \add is\add* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, When he \w ascended|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* on \w high|strong="G5311"\w*, he \w led|strong="G0162"\w* \w captivity|strong="G0161"\w* \w captive|strong="G0162"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1390"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

(\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* he \w ascended|strong="G0305"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2597"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w lower|strong="G2737"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*?

He \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* ascended \w up|strong="G0305"\w* far \w above|strong="G5231"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w fill|strong="G4137"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w*, \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w*, \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w*, \w evangelists|strong="G2099"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w*, \w pastors|strong="G4166"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*;

\w For|strong="G4314"\w* the \w perfecting|strong="G2677"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Till|strong="G3360"\w* \w we|strong="G2658"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w come|strong="G2658"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w unity|strong="G1775"\w* of the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of the \w stature|strong="G2244"\w* of the \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G5600"\w* \add henceforth\add* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* no \w more|strong="G3371"\w* \w children|strong="G3516"\w*, tossed to and \w fro|strong="G2831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* carried \w about|strong="G4064"\w* with \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w wind|strong="G0417"\w* of \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sleight|strong="G2940"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \add and\add* cunning \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G4314"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* lie in \w wait|strong="G3180"\w* to \w deceive|strong="G4106"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* speaking the \w truth|strong="G0226"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, may grow \w up|strong="G0837"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* in all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \add even\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w From|strong="G1537"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* fitly joined \w together|strong="G4883"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w compacted|strong="G4822"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w joint|strong="G0860"\w* \w supplieth|strong="G2024"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the effectual \w working|strong="G1753"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*, \w maketh|strong="G4160"\w* \w increase|strong="G0838"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w* of \w itself|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testify|strong="G3143"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, that \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w henceforth|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3371"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w vanity|strong="G3153"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*,

\w Having|strong="G4654"\w* the \w understanding|strong="G1271"\w* \w darkened|strong="G4654"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* alienated \w from|strong="G0526"\w* the \w life|strong="G2222"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w ignorance|strong="G0052"\w* that \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* of the \w blindness|strong="G4457"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* being past \w feeling|strong="G0524"\w* have \w given|strong="G3860"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* unto \w lasciviousness|strong="G0766"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w work|strong="G2039"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w greediness|strong="G4124"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G3129"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

If so be \w that|strong="G1489"\w* ye have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have been \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

That \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* put \w off|strong="G0659"\w* \w concerning|strong="G2596"\w* the \w former|strong="G4387"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* the \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w corrupt|strong="G5351"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w deceitful|strong="G0539"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*;
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* be \w renewed|strong="G0365"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* that ye put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G0225"\w* \w holiness|strong="G3742"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* putting \w away|strong="G0659"\w* \w lying|strong="G5579"\w*, \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* one of \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

Be ye \w angry|strong="G3710"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: \w let|strong="G1931"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* go \w down|strong="G1931"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3950"\w*:
\w Neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* to the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

Let \w him|strong="G2813"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w stole|strong="G2813"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w* no \w more|strong="G3371"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* let \w him|strong="G2872"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w*, \w working|strong="G2038"\w* \w with|strong="G5495"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* the thing which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* to \w give|strong="G3330"\w* to him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w needeth|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1607"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w corrupt|strong="G4550"\w* \w communication|strong="G3056"\w* \w proceed|strong="G1607"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G1487"\w* which \w is|strong="G5100"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w use|strong="G5532"\w* of \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it may \w minister|strong="G1325"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* unto the \w hearers|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w grieve|strong="G3076"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G3739"\w* ye are \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G0142"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w bitterness|strong="G4088"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anger|strong="G3709"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w clamour|strong="G2906"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* evil \w speaking|strong="G0988"\w*, be put \w away|strong="G0142"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w malice|strong="G2549"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* be \w ye|strong="G1096"\w* \w kind|strong="G5543"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w tenderhearted|strong="G2155"\w*, \w forgiving|strong="G5483"\w* one \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christâ€™s sake|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w forgiven|strong="G5483"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.
